updated_cases.title: Validate Http Download >16MB with Private app + DLP Profile with LFS enabled with data trickling
updated_cases.custom_preconds:
Features to be enabled
- LFS with data trickling
- clientlessNpa
- npa_support_dlp
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- User should be to create RTP policy with these parameters
            - Access method: Browser Access
            - Destination: Private app, and select Browser Access based APP for HTTP/HTTPS
            - Activity: Upload
            - profile: DLP Profile(any)
            - action: Allow
- Send Https traffic to match policy conditions. and traffic should be blocked
- Skope-it Alert should be create for matching policy for FormPost activity
